divs: sighting detailsabout 9:30 pm on june 6 i saw 2 objects in the sky. i guess they were about a mile away, although a frame of reference is difficult to guage. they were blue and red lighted objects. that is, i saw both blue and red linear\tubular type lights possibly framing the objects. it's not that the objects flashed an obvious red to blue, or converse, maybe the object rotated so i could see different colors? i was on the west side of olathe lake in kansas looking east. my best guess is the objects were over oregon trail junior high school. the 2 objects appeared to hover and then drop close to the ground and then go up and down somewhat in a circular manner. the motion was very random and independent from the other. i really didn't pay that much attention to the event because i don't believe in extra terrestrials or the like. i was fishing at the time. i spoke to another man who stated he had seen the same lights, at least twice before in recent days. he wasn't overly concerned either. here is what i think it is: lighted kites? maybe r.c. helicopters? as i mentioned before, i don't believe in aliens, or at least the laws of physics and space travel limit my belief in e.t. chillin' over lake olathe! therefore, these 2 objects must be explainable. i know i saw 2 lighted, colored objects moving up, down, and around in the sky. the moved in a way that no aircraft could possibly move. i do believe the motions, pathe, and timing could have been precision kites. i have seen kites at festivals that could have moved this way. i don't know what they were, but i sure would like to! hence the reason i am reporting this incident. i have never seen something like this before. i am not a blogger, or poster for that matter. i welcome your explanations to what i saw. please, if you are a crazed lunatic, don't try to contact me with your insane theories!!!! :)
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Olathe
There were no other sightings in Olathe on or around June 6th 2012
Summary: It looked like kites with red and blue lights about a mile away.
